short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Handy tool for Drupal CMS Web editing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Handy tool for tabs switch
it can just replace the subdomain of the tab's url
like change www.baudu.com => www.google.com
and switch between them with shortcut (ctrl+shift+arrowLeft/Right) no need to open a new tab
